buddhimathwa nuwanin sitha bala wiwechanayatada lak nowana ayurin pinkam sakaswima itha aadarshawath we.bududahama hama wita hamata setha salasana uthum dahamak wana athara kisiwakuta karadara hirihara karana dahamak nowana bawa apa tharaye sihithaba gatha yuththaki.kenekuta haniyak, hiriharayak karadarayak, wedanawak nowimata apa apage hara paddhathin aaraksha kara ganimata buddhimath wiya yuthuwe.lankawe menma shri lankeya bhikshun wahanse wesena lowa boho ratawala da katina pinkama itha alankarayen sidu wana maha pinkamaki.dharmanudharma prathipaththi garu kala yuthu atharama shraddhawa wardhanaya wana kusal dahamhi nirathawimada agaya kala yuthuya.

oostreliyawa aasannaye jathyanthara muhude naukawaka randawa gena sitina shri lankikayan athulu sankramanikayan pirisa oostreliyawata ragena eemata baladharinta sidu wuye indiyawa owun bhara ganima prathikshepa kirima hethuwen bawa manawa himikam kriyadharayo pawasathi.naukawe sitina sankramanikayan 157 dena godabimata ragena with randawa ganna bawa sankramanika katayuthu bhara amathya skot morisan sikurada niwedanaya kale indiyawe sancharayakin anathuruwayi.heta rathriya wana wita sankramanikayan siyalu denama randawum kandawurakata ragena enu athayi apeksha karana bawayi, anathayan sandaha wu kriyakari sandhanaye iyan rintul bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiye."mekata pradhana hethu dekak thiyenawa: ekak thamayi, oostreliyawe mahadhikaranaya," yanuwen ohu sandahan kale oostreliyanu aanduwe me hadisi prathipaththi wenasata hethuwa kawarak dayi sandeshaya saroj pathirana kala wimasimakadi."aanduwa me deshapalana rakawarana pathannan pirisa jathyanthara muhudedi athadanguwata aragena randawa ganimedi nithyanukulawa kriya kaleda yanna gana karunu gananawak wimasanna thibena bawa mahadhikaranaya kiwuwa," bawayi iyan rintul pawasanne.'hethu dekak'naukawe sitina deshapalana rakawarana pathannage ananyathawaya pariksha kirimata indiya thanapathi niladharinta awasara dena bawa pawasana amathya skot morisan, ehi indiya purawasiyan sitinne nam owun indiyawata bharadimata katayuthu kirimata ida thibena bawada pawasiya.indiyawa indiya purawasiyan nowana ayath bhara ganimata ida thibena namuth kandayame kisiwekuta oostreliyawe padinchiwimata awasara nodena bawa amathyawaraya awadharanaya kaleya.
ema satanen pohosathwa sitinne simbabwe pilayi.hethuwa owun me tharagayata muhuna denne perahuru tharaga watayedi ostreliyawa parajaya kirimen pasuwa wimaya.
